about_the_game:
Lemons are not what they seem. These creatures are dangerous, cruel and insanely fun! Welcome to the world of Battlemon! Become one of the Lemon Nation fighters! Learn all the secrets of the lemon world and compete it with other lemonade lovers!

What can a simple lemon in danger do? Shoot a rocket in the face of your enemies! This is exactly what they do in this hurricane and ever-changing world! Constant skirmishes in changing conditions will make you strain all your reflexes, and the dynamics will not let you get bored! Each match is unique and has its own victory conditions. Do you want measured gameplay with your own set of weapons and skills? Or to collect everything on the battlefield? Whatever you love, Battlemon will give it to you!

Unique character's design
Step into the skin of anthropomorphic lemons, which fully convey the feeling of combat!


Advanced equipment progression system
With equipment upgrade, lemon can use more skills and equipment for every taste. There is no “winning build” here - just try!


Dynamic locations and changing weather conditions during the match
Weather conditions can change the course of the battle, and changing locations affect on vertical gameplay. Enjoy it!


Parkour and dynamics
Lemons can climb into very hard-to-reach places, there are almost NO borders for them! The dynamics of the battle in slides and flights on jumppads will not make you bored!


Nice gunplay
The feel of each weapon is unique. Find something that truly reflects your weapon skills!


Rank and Season Ranking System
Dynamic ranking system changes every season in different modes. Achieve victory and bask in the rays of glory, receiving bonuses for achieving high positions!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2,3 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640 1536 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2,3 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640 1536 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Battlemon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: i3-i5 4gen (or similar AMD)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 (min 2 Gb)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4 Gen or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Battlemon is a third-person shooter based on fast-paced skirmishes and dynamic map events. Until the last drop of juice!
